The Arm Letterpress

The Arm Letterpress shop is in Brooklyn, NY. It's the first place I ever laid my hands on wood type and it holds a special place in my heart.

thearmnyc.com

Client

Role

Concept, Design, Development, Interviewing

Team

Live Site

thearmnyc.com

I collaborated with Jonny Gotham on the design and build of this site. We worked with Dan to improve the overall look of the site, while focusing on allowing him to feature events happening at the shop. We also redesigned the booking system for reserving press time.
